MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Weaver road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:56PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:15AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:14PM on 13th February 2021
